related_post.text: Stumbled upon this on stackoverflow. You could try opening your workbooks with xlsxwriter and adjusting them.```You could use set_column as follows:worksheet1.set_column(1 1 25)This is defined as follows:set_column(first_col last_col width cell_format options)```https://stackoverflow.com/questions/33665865/adjustcellwidthinexcel
